price: (26) So Allāh made them taste disgrace in worldly life. But the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.
arabic: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخِزۡيَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-adhāqahumu al-lahu al-khiz'ya fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
